sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import {ActionCreator} from "../../store/actions" import {useSelector, useDispatch} from 'react-redux'; import {SortLink} from "./sort-link"; import {AddUser} from"../add-user-form/add-user-form"; import {SearchBar} from '../search-bar/search-bar'; import {dataStateSelector, sortDataSelector} from '../../store/selectors' import {UserCard} from '../user-card/user-card'; export const Table = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const sortData = useSelector(sortDataSelector); const [user, setUser] = useState(''); return( <> {sortData.map(item => ( setUser(item)} className="people__row"> ))}
{item.id} {item.firstName} {item.lastName} {item.email} {item.phone}
{user ? : null} ) }
